price: "Yusufu! Ka kau da kai daga wannan. Kuma ki nẽmi gãfara* dõmin laifinki. Lalle ne ke, kin kasance daga mãsu kuskure."
arabic: يُوسُفُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَٰذَاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِي لِذَنۢبِكِۖ إِنَّكِ كُنتِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَاطِـِٔينَ
footnotes: * Mai gida ya yi hukunci da yabon girman hãlin Yũsufu da kuma neman ya kashe maganar a nan.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yūsufu aʿriḍ ʿan hādhā wa-is'taghfirī lidhanbiki innaki kunti mina al-khāṭiīna
